channel.title: Quartermaster Conference Presentation, 2013
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nJDJVTyp7jo
@rgchris mentions that Quartermaster has several dialect pieces ("parts"). I imagine each one probably warrants its own topic, at minimum. Talking about the generality of it, maybe looking over the Rebol2 source and thinking about what Ren-C brings to the table for it.
* [Quartermaster MATCH Dialect](https://forum.rebol.info/t/quartermaster-match-dialect-name-conflict-with-ren-c/661)
* [Quartermaster VALIDATE Dialect](https://forum.rebol.info/t/quartermaster-validate-dialect/660)

item.title: Quartermaster Conference Presentation, 2013
item.dc:creator: hostilefork
item.description:
Chris Ross-Gill: QuarterMaster Overview (July 2013)

@rgchris mentions that Quartermaster has several dialect pieces ("parts"). I imagine each one probably warrants its own topic, at minimum. Talking about the generality of it, maybe looking over the Rebol2 source and thinking about what Ren-C brings to the table for it.

  • Quartermaster MATCH Dialect

  • Quartermaster VALIDATE Dialect

Read full topic
